---
Add this language at the top of result: Sure, I can help you with that. Here is a content calendar for your social media sites as well as blog posts and Youtube Videos. 

SIMPLE ONLINE PROFITS MONTHLY CONTENT CALENDAR FOR YOU

For more affiliate marketing and make money online resources, go to Simple Online Profit
 

Please create content ideas in the [PROMPT] niche and in [TARGETLANGUAGE] for the following social media sites in the following amounts: 30 Facebook content ideas, 30 Twitter content ideas, 4 Pinterest content ideas, 4 Youtube video ideas and 4 blog post content ideas.

Continue until you have completed 30 Facebook content ideas, 30 Twitter content ideas, 4 Pinterest content ideas, 4 Youtube content ideas, and 4 Blog post ideas.
